title: Chris Rock: A Joke about Raising Kids
description: Chris Rock jokes about raising kids in his Netflix special, "Tamborine: The Extended Cut". Don't forget to grab your tickets to Netflix is a Joke: The Festival running from April 29-May 8th 2022.  Tickets go on sale Friday, December 10th at NetflixisaJokeFest.com.
author: podcasts@netflix.com (Chris Rock)
